data.title: PayPal, MoonPay, and M0 introduce PYUSDx for app developers to create custom stablecoins, backed by PayPal USD. Fast launch and cross-chain support offered.
data.description: PYUSDx is a platform that enables developers to create stablecoins specific to their applications, backed by PayPal USD. The platform offers a quick launch process, supports cross-chain functionality, and allows for customized branding of the tokens.

data.title: Albertsons appoints Brian Rice to Board of Directors, effective Feb. 25, 2026.
data.description: Albertsons Companies has recently appointed Brian Rice to its Board of Directors, with the effective date set for Feb. 25, 2026.

data.title: RAW Nutrition introduces new RAW Protein Bars with 18–21g protein and 1–5g sugar, offering candy-bar taste.
data.description: A sport nutrition brand, RAW Nutrition, has released RAW Protein Bars in Port St. Lucie, Fla. These bars offer 18–21 grams of protein and only 1–5 grams of added sugar in four tasty flavors. For many, protein bars have been a compromise between taste and nutrition, often lacking in one aspect. RAW Protein Bars aim to bridge this gap by providing both flavor and solid macronutrient content, unlike traditional candy bars which cater more to cravings.

data.title: AECOM secures 3 contracts from Sound Transit in Seattle for engineering, environmental review, and construction management services, potentially worth $1 billion.
data.description: Engineering firm AECOM (NYSE: ACM) recently secured three contracts from Sound Transit to assist with transportation projects in Seattle. The contracts involve providing engineering design, environmental review, and construction management services for rail and bus system enhancements. These contracts, awarded through multiple-award task order agreements, will span over five years. Sound Transit has granted a total of 19 contracts as part of the initiative, with an estimated value of around $1 billion for engineering services throughout the contract duration. AECOM will play a crucial role in driving these projects forward.

data.title: Canoly's C16 Cold Press Juicer surpasses 100,000 sales in 6 months, establishing brand in kitchen appliance market.
data.description: In Atlanta on February 27, 2026, Canoly, a rising kitchen appliance company, shared news that their leading product, the C16 cold press juicer, has achieved over 100,000 units sold in just six months since its introduction in 2025. This achievement solidifies Canoly's position as a prominent player in the market.

data.title: VNET raises US$138 million through private placement of 81.0 million shares. Leader in China's data center services.
data.description: On February 27, 2026, VNET Group, Inc. (Nasdaq: VNET), a prominent internet data center services provider in China, disclosed a private placement of 81.0 million fresh Class A ordinary shares.

data.title: Professional vegan haircare brand DESIGNME launches Rooting for All Women campaign celebrating transformation, strength, and collective impact.
data.description: In Montreal on February 27, 2026, DESIGNME, a Canadian haircare brand known for its vegan products, launched a special campaign called Rooting for All Women. This limited-edition initiative is dedicated to celebrating women, highlighting their growth, and recognizing the strength of change in all phases of life. The campaign showcases the talents of hairstylists and advocates for female empowerment.

data.title: Hudson Pacific Properties (NYSE: HPP) CEO to join roundtable at Citi’s 2026 Global Property CEO Conference on March 2. Live webcast available.
data.description: In Los Angeles, Hudson Pacific Properties, Inc. (NYSE: HPP) revealed that Victor Coleman, Chairman and CEO, and other senior executives will join a roundtable at Citi’s 2026 Global Property CEO Conference on March 2, 2026, at 2:10 p.m. ET. Those interested can access the live webcast of the discussion on the company's website, with a replay becoming available one hour post-event.

data.title: US PPI lifts gold to 1-month peak, pushes Bitcoin towards 3% dip as inflation concerns grip markets.
data.description: The latest data on US PPI inflation, indicating higher temperatures, has had contrasting effects on different assets. Precious metals saw a boost while Bitcoin bulls faced a setback, resulting in a nearly 3% decrease in BTC price for the day.

The European Union will implement a mammoth trade deal with the South American Mercosur bloc while waiting for a top court's ruling on its legality, EU chief Ursula von der Leyen said Friday. The European Commission's move, announced after Argentina and Uruguay ratified the

data.title: Domo to release Q4 and FY 2026 earnings on March 10, 2026 after market close. Conference call at 3pm (MT) / 5pm (ET).
data.description: Domo (Nasdaq: DOMO) based in Silicon Slopes, Utah, announced that it will release its fourth-quarter and full-year fiscal 2026 results on Tuesday, March 10, 2026. The fiscal year ended on January 31, 2026. Following the market close, the company will host a conference call at 3:00 p.m. (MT) / 5:00 p.m. (ET) to discuss its financial performance with investors. Those interested can join the call live by dialing (877) 484-6065 or (201) 689-8846. Additionally, a live webcast of the event will be accessible on Domo Inves.

data.title: Tradeweb (Nasdaq: TW) to partake in Raymond James Conference on March 3, 2026, with CEO Billy Hult speaking at 8:05 AM EST.
data.description: In New York, Tradeweb Markets Inc. (Nasdaq: TW) will be attending the Raymond James 47th Annual Institutional Investors Conference on Tuesday, March 3, 2026. CEO Billy Hult will engage in a fireside chat at 8:05 AM EST during the event. Those interested can access the live webcast of the session at https://investors.tradeweb.com/events-

data.title: Cloudpermit acquires CityReporter for enhanced local government software suite, expanding maintenance and inspections software capabilities.
data.description: On February 27, 2026, in Reston, Virginia, Cloudpermit, a prominent community development platform for local governments, announced the acquisition of CityReporter's cloud-based maintenance management and inspections software. This strategic move aims to enhance Cloudpermit's services by integrating CityReporter's expertise in maintenance and asset management. The acquisition underscores Cloudpermit's commitment to providing comprehensive solutions for local governments and is poised to greatly benefit their clients.

data.title: AGCO to present at Raymond James conference on March 2, 2026. Damon Audia to participate in fireside chat.
data.description: In Duluth, Georgia, on February 27, 2026, AGCO disclosed its participation in the Raymond James 47th Annual Institutional Investors Conference set for March 2, 2026. This will feature a fireside chat with Damon Audia, the Senior Vice President and Chief Officer. AGCO is listed on NYSE as AGCO.

data.title: New Era and adidas team up to supply on-field caps to more baseball programs in 2026, expanding NCAA partnership.
data.description: Buffalo, NY - A collaboration between New Era and adidas has resulted in the creation of the 2026 NCAA College Baseball Collection. The collection includes a variety of items featuring the iconic logos of popular college baseball teams. The partnership aims to combine the style and innovation of both brands to offer fans high-quality merchandise. The collection can be viewed through images and videos linked above. This collaboration marks a significant step for both companies in the sports and lifestyle market.

data.title: IRS no longer has Direct File; opt for Free File program with commercial tax software or free tools for certain filers.
data.description: The agency provides a Free File program in collaboration with commercial tax software firms, allowing taxpayers to file their taxes for free. Additionally, some companies offer free tools tailored for specific groups of filers.
